title: Break for Me
description: Trista has been on the run for years, attempting to escape a past that isn’t willing to let her go. Life taught her that she can rely only on herself for survival, and in turn, it’s made her cold, calculating, manipulative, and just a little vindictive. She knows they’re out there searching for her. She knows someone will always be right behind her, but a life spent running and hiding is exhausting. A life spent fighting and outsmarting her pursuers takes a toll.Jersey is a soulless hunter. As far as the world is concerned, his identity was erased right alongside his humanity. Now, he works for an organization that pays him to locate and return treasured and sought-after things for questionable people. Giving up any remaining emotional connection to the world was a small price to pay in exchange for becoming the most efficient at what he does. He is assigned the jobs that so many others have failed. There’s no length to which he will not go to find success.Their collision is explosive when Jersey finds himself face-to-face with someone else who’s used to living in isolation, someone else who’s used to surviving by any means necessary. Their limits are tested when one will stop at nothing to escape his custody, while the other will do whatever it takes to return her to those who are willing to pay.This dual-perspective, dark romance is emotionally turbulent and is intended for readers over 18 years of age. There are trigger warnings included within the first pages of the book. Please read and understand them before venturing further.
author: Ember Nicole
